overview: Two University of Virginia workers share a drink and conversation at a local nightclub. One worker is a phlebotomist and the other is a former EKG technician who has relocated from New Mexico and works now in the university cafeteria.Starring Ricky Goldman and Richard Cooper.  Inspired by the 1973 film "The Mack" starring Max Julian and Richard Pryor.
tagline: Two University of Virginia workers share a drink and conversation at a local nightclub.
title: Gospel Hill
